Digital Summit 2020 Tickets

Tickets

The Digital Summit will be held over 4 days between 10 and 19 November 2020 as a virtual event.

We have a set of flexible ticket options so you can make the most out of your Digital Summit experience.

All dates and prices are subject to change.

Early bird

Opens 10:30 am, 25 September 2020. Closes 5:00 pm, 18 October 2020.

Early bird – all days

$275.00 (inc. GST)

Access to all days of the Digital Summit (10, 12, 17 and 19 November). This includes access to all plenary sessions, case studies, on-demand presentations, and access to the virtual exhibition hub. Excludes workshops.

Early bird – single day

$110.00 (inc. GST)

Access to one day of your choice. This includes access to all plenary sessions, case studies, on-demand presentations, and access to the virtual exhibition hub on that specified day. Excludes workshops.

Buy tickets
Get updates

Standard

Opens 5:00 pm, 18 October 2020. Closes 11:59 pm, 8 November 2020.

Standard registration – all days

$385.00 (inc. GST)

Access to all days of the Digital Summit (10, 12, 17 and 19 November). This includes access to all plenary sessions, case studies, on-demand presentations, and access to the virtual exhibition hub. Excludes workshops.

Standard registration bird – single day

$200.00 (inc. GST)

Access to one day of your choice. This includes access to all plenary sessions, case studies, on-demand presentations, and access to the virtual exhibition hub on that specified day. Excludes workshops.

Buy tickets
Get updates

Student

Opens 10:30 am 25 September. Closes 11:59 pm, 8 November 2020.

Standard student registration – all days

$150.00 (inc. GST)

Access to all days of the Digital Summit (10, 12, 17 and 19 November). This includes access to all plenary sessions, case studies, on-demand presentations, and access to the virtual exhibition hub. Excludes workshops.

Standard student registration – single day

$75.00 (inc. GST)

Access to one day of your choice. This includes access to all plenary sessions, case studies, on-demand presentations, and access to the virtual exhibition hub on that specified day. Excludes workshops.

Workshops

Workshop tickets open 5:00 pm, 11 October and close 11:59 pm, 8 November 2020.

We will announce the workshops soon. Register to get updates.

  • workshop registration is $165.00 per workshop
  • each ticket is for a single workshop only
  • workshops limited to 30 attendees
  • you cannot transfer tickets to another workshop.

Day 1 – Disruption and Change

12:30 pm to 1:30 pm, Tuesday 10 November

30 tickets available per workshop

  • workshop 1 – 55 minutes
  • workshop 2 – 55 minutes.

Day 2 – Human-centred Services

12:30 pm to 1:30 pm, Thursday 12 November

30 tickets available per workshop

  • workshop 1 – 55 minutes
  • workshop 2 – 55 minutes.

Day 3 – Leadership and People

12:30 pm to 1:30 pm, Tuesday 17 November

30 tickets available per workshop

  • workshop 1 – 55 minutes
  • workshop 2 – 55 minutes.

Day 4 – Technology and Data

12:30 pm to 1:30 pm, Thursday 19 November

30 tickets available per workshop

  • workshop 1 – 55 minutes
  • workshop 2 – 55 minutes.
